channel.title: [PI]Combat system is f***ed up, Kick trains atk etc
channel.description:
So yeah, basically it's pretty munted. Kick trains ATK/or Def Block trains Str Punch trains def
If anyone knows how to fix this it would be AH MAZING, Im willing to pay you some $$
